title: Okinawa Autotech to invest 25 million euros in next three years to develop new products, powertrain
description: "Setting up the global R&D centre showcases our ambition to bring the best technologies from the entire world to our Indian customers. The centre will be working on developing futuristic technologies for next-gen electric vehicles," Okinawa Autotech MD and founder Jeetender Sharma said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
